title: KX Tech Club: Productivity and Creativity
description: KX Tech Club: Productivity and Creativity

components.content: .hoiWrapper { margin-top: 0 !important; } .hoiKv__Media:after { padding-bottom: 33% !important; } .hoiWrapper h2 { margin-bottom: 0 !important;} .hoiWrapper h5 { margin-top: 0 !important; }

components.copy: KX Tech Club: Productivity and Creativity

text: In session 4, we dive into productivity and creativity with guest speakers and productivity guru’s Jordan Mitchell, founder of Good Culture Inc, Corrie Jones, founder of Untapped Digital and our Samsung KX team. The three-part series looks at their creative processes, work and life pressures and how the Z Fold3 helps them stay productive.

components.copy: KX Tech Club: Episode 1 - Process (How to stay productive)

text: In episode 1, Jordan and Corrie discuss their creative processes, offering up advice for managing your time effectively, allowing you to make the most of your working day. Discussing how ‘eating the frog’ (you’ll find out!) is often a good way to stay productive, and how they use these methods to help them create and grow successful businesses.

components.copy: KX Tech Club: Episode 2 - Pressure (How to find balance)

text: In episode 2, Jordan and Corrie discuss how they combat pressure online, divulging on hustle culture and how slowing down has been a key component to their success. Jordan talks about how she’s learnt to be protective of boundaries, while Corrie makes sure to take time to rest and recoup.

components.copy: KX Tech Club: Episode 3 - Tech + Creativity (How to use tech effectively)

text: In episode 3 we discuss Jordan and Corrie's top tech hacks, showing us how they use their Samsung devices to stay productive and creative. We get into the nitty-gritty, finding out their personal mantras, useful tools and what inspires them.
